description:
The earth sciences club girls are preparing for their cultural festival. Sakura and Ino, the geology club girls, are conducting a real boring survey on the schoolyard. Meanwhile, Mira, Ao, and Monroe, the astronomy club girls, are working hard to produce a replica of the solar system at Mira`s home. Then the day of the festival finally arrives.
With Suzu`s help the earth sciences club`s geocafe is open for business and all the club members are wearing maid outfits.
Source: crunchyroll
